CWEs: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
description: The function 'unique_name_607' is vulnerable to SQL Injection. The function constructs SQL queries by concatenating user-supplied input (from 'options' object) directly into the query. An attacker could provide specially crafted input to manipulate the SQL query, leading to unauthorized data access, data corruption or data loss.
